review:
Hi all  I am a resident of UAE and lives in Dubai. I came with severe pain at my  RIGHT TMJ. 
Dr. Divyangna reviewed my case and  I am undergoing treatment. 
I am been advised couple of investigations. By,I am now confident as my doctor is very informative and found the cause. 
Thanks Dr. Divyangna and Dr. Lalit and team of LADIVYA DENTAL CLINICS, Vikaspuri Branch. 
Warm Regards,
Mrs. Deepa

Hi everyone, I am a resident of Scotland and I came here on urgent basis while I was in India. Because of my upper front tooth fracture I was feeling sensitivity and I got treated myself by Dr. Divyangna, very esthetically she restored my tooth and my problem was solved. I am very satisfied by the way she did that. 
Thank you

Very friendly and hygienic dental setup. I and my husband got several dental fillings done. 
As, we were about to fly to Canada this weekend we were told by others  to visit this clinic if you want timely treatment. 
The best part was the waiting time was 0 minutes â˜º.
 We are surely gonna tell others.

I am very happy to inform that I am a Dentist myself and wantedva reliable and competent Dentist to touch my teeth and I can't compromise on my smile. 
Getting treatment here is a privilege and I feel confident with Dr. Divyangna Chaudhary to get my smile makeover. 
I suggest all patients and people to get world class work done to regain their beautiful smile

Excellent experience. Very courteous Doctor n staff..expertise in their field and the environment was also very stress free and hygienic , all credits goes to Dr.Divyangna and Dr. Lalit. Dr. Divyangna did my metal free crowns and bridges and Dr. Lalit did my Implants. I am 200% satisfied and recommend to every needy people requiring dental treatment. I feel privileged to get them for my whole life.

The treatment at LADIVYA CENTRES FOR ORAL HEALTH CARE was beyond my belief and I am 100% satisfied by the treatment procedure. I highly recommend others for getting this unique experience and forget about the painful dental procedures. Regards, Mr. Avnish.
Appointment was honored on time, the problem was well understood and all queries were resolved with proper explanation

I came with severe swelling and unbearable pain. 
Dr. Divyangna saw my case and prescribed medicines and gave instructions before undergoing extraction.
I am totally satisfied and ask other needy patients to visit LaDivya Dental Clinics. 
Thanks.
Madam,Dr. Divyangna did my cosmetic fillings and it was really beyond words. I am very very happy and will definitely tell others to have your services.
I underwent implant procedure. The procedure was absolutely very smooth and anxiety free. I have no words to praise about the handling of my case. I really feel lucky to find them not as a doctor
